name: WittertainmentWiki
0:
”Alexa Open Wittertainment Wiki”
”Alexa Ask Wittertainment Wiki how to play a double bass”
”Alexa Ask Wittertainment Wiki how can I listen to the show”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wittertainment wiki
des:
A simple skill for fans of Wittertainment (Mark Kermode's and Simon Mayo's film review show on BBC Radio 5 Live). 
It mimics interacting with the show without the hassle of emailing or tweeting into the show.
You can ask it how you do anything and you will get an accurate and concise response, just as if you were speaking to Mark or Simon for real.
Hello to Jason Isaacs.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
